main event: On June 9, 1967, a witness observed a bright light in the sky southeast of Excelsior, Minnesota. The object was estimated to be 1/2 mile in diameter and approximately 500 feet above the ground, seen for about 10 minutes before it rapidly accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting was reported to the local police department,No other witnesses are known at this time,The object was described as spherical in shape and silvery in color,The object was hovering at a low altitude of about 500 feet,The sighting has been documented as part of Project Blue Book, a historical U.S. Air Force program.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Mr. T.L. Wallis, male, age 40, occupation student, excellent reliability
